bcu.harvardreferencing

Class JournalArticle

  • java.lang.Object
    • bcu.harvardreferencing.Publication
      • bcu.harvardreferencing.JournalArticle

  • public class JournalArticle
extends Publication
    This class represents a Journal Article. It stores the information about the journal article.

    Authors are stored as a list of Author objects List<Author> authors.

    Author:
    Andrew Kay

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JournalArticle(java.util.List<Author> authors, java.lang.String title, int year, java.lang.String journalName, int volume, int issue, int pageFrom, int pageTo)
      Creates a new JournalArticle that stores: the List of authors; the title of the work; the year the work was published; the name of the Journal it is published in; the volume of the Journal the issue of the Journal; the page the article starts on in the Journal and the page the article finishes on in the Journal.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getIssue()
      Gets the issue number of the journal the article is written in.
      java.lang.String getJournalName()
      Gets the name of the journal the work is in.
      int getPageFrom()
      Gets the page number the article starts on in the Journal.
      int getPageTo()
      Gets the page number the article finishes on in the Journal.
      int getVolume()
      Gets the volume number of the journal the article is written in.
      java.lang.String harvardReference()
      Gets the Harvard reference of the Journal article to generate the bibliography.

      • Methods inherited from class bcu.harvardreferencing.Publication

        authorNames, getAuthors, getTitle, getYear

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • JournalArticle

        public JournalArticle(java.util.List<Author> authors,
                      java.lang.String title,
                      int year,
                      java.lang.String journalName,
                      int volume,
                      int issue,
                      int pageFrom,
                      int pageTo)
        Creates a new JournalArticle that stores: the List of authors; the title of the work; the year the work was published; the name of the Journal it is published in; the volume of the Journal the issue of the Journal; the page the article starts on in the Journal and the page the article finishes on in the Journal.
        Parameters:
        authors - Takes a list of Authors.
        title - Takes the title of the work.
        year - Takes the year of publication of the work.
        journalName - Takes the name of the journal the work is published in.
        volume - Takes the volume of the journal the work is published in.
        issue - Takes the issue of the journal the work is published in.
        pageFrom - Takes the page of the journal the work starts on.
        pageTo - Takes the page of the journal the work finishes on.
        See Also:
        Author
